channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: He May Have Pulled The Trigger, But Charlie Kirk’s Suspected Killer Didn’t ‘Act Alone’
item.description: The alleged 'radicalized' assassin did not get to this moment on his own. Investigation details show a young man steeped in leftist dogma.

item.title: Utah authorities recommend aggravated murder charges in Charlie Kirk shooting
item.description: Tyler Robinson, the 22-year-old college dropout charged in the shooting death of Charlie Kirk, faces aggravated murder charges in Utah.

item.title: After His Murder, New York Times Assassinates Charlie Kirk’s Character

item.title: Murders Rise As Publishing Houses Sell Violent LGBT Fantasies To Kids
item.description: The publishing industry is cranking out books based on the murderous nihilism of the trans community and marketing them to kids.

item.title: The Qatar Lobby Is Real — and a Real Problem

item.title: The Siren Song of Despair
item.description: Kirk’s murder will long be remembered as a symbol of the irrationality and hatred of this era, but we also need to remember the importance of his life...

item.title: Charlie Kirk: A Serious Man
item.description: I have the privilege of knowing and loving many high-minded, intelligent, serious young people. Charlie stands out as one of the best.

item.title: The Week: Charlie Kirk and the Assassin’s Veto
item.description: Plus: Kamala blames Team Biden for her defeat.

item.title: In Such Times, We Need Law, Civil Discourse, and Normal Politics More Than Ever
item.description: The killing of Charlie Kirk will be a radicalizing moment but should not alter our commitment to the American Way.

item.title: Congress Must Root Out Leftist Funding That Created Climate Ripe For Kirk Assassination
item.description: Influence always costs money when the an issue is not important enough to resonate with people on its own.
